solution_line_template: He estimates the building on the left is {left_building_height} feet tall because {middle_building_height} x {left_building_ratio} = <<{middle_building_height}*{left_building_ratio}={left_building_height}>>{left_building_height}

The combined height of the left and middle is {combined_left_middle_height} because {middle_building_height} + {left_building_height} = <<{middle_building_height}+{left_building_height}={combined_left_middle_height}>>{combined_left_middle_height}

The building on the right he estimates as {right_building_height} feet because {combined_left_middle_height} - {right_building_shorter_amount} = <<{combined_left_middle_height}-{right_building_shorter_amount}={right_building_height}>>{right_building_height}

He estimates the combined height as {total_height} feet because {left_building_height} + {middle_building_height} + {right_building_height} = <<{left_building_height}+{middle_building_height}+{right_building_height}={total_height}>>{total_height}
